game_selection_title: Guess the characters of Knights of the Zodiac
mode_silhouette_desc: Guess the armor by the silhouette
hint_default_msg: No hint available for this character.
form_placeholder: Type the name of the Knight
form_error_already_tried: You have already tried this character!
result_character_was: The character of the day was:
stats_history_msg: Complete your first game to see the statistics!
footer_legal_disclaimer: Saint Seiya ¬© Masami Kurumada/Shueisha, Toei Animation. All series rights are reserved by their respective owners. This site is a tribute to the original work.
app_description: Daily character guessing game for Saint Seiya
help_rule_1: The objective is to guess the Saint Seiya character of the day in as few attempts as possible. Type a name to begin.
help_indicator_green: The characteristic (Gender, Rank, Sign, etc.) is CORRECT.
help_indicator_up: The value (Age, Height, Weight) of the character you guessed is LESS THAN the correct value.
help_indicator_down: The value (Age, Height, Weight) of the character you guessed is GREATER THAN the correct value.
help_rule_2: Use the arrows (‚ñ≤/‚ñº) to guide your next guesses (e.g., üî∫ Height means you need to try a TALLER character).
help_available_hints_msg: Two textual hints are available: Hint 1 unlocks after {hint1} attempts and Hint 2 unlocks after {hint2} attempts.
help_footer_tip: Suggestion navigation in the input works with the 'Up/Down Arrow' and 'Enter' keys.
